I have personally seen a  big executive came from the UK stayed in TAJ WESTEND  for RS  100000/- day class suit and tells us how to save cost.  We held our quality conference in the cafeteria to save on hotel costs with the same guy who came in  BMW  rented car from  TAJ WESTEND.  People notice all these things very well.  Those very few executive class people have a passion for elephant ride and the company arranges for that. They want to visit the racecourse and the company arranges for that.
